<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gloaming Shard](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1058)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 185 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The blade of this _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ shines the color of twilight, with a triangular lattice design on the hilt. A thin string of darkness connects your shadow to that of the blade, even once it leaves your hand.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact ([shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143), [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You make a [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) Strike with the _gloaming shard_ at a target within 60 feet. Whether you hit or miss, rather than returning to you, the blade pulls you down into your own shadow and along the connecting thread. You instantly teleport to a space adjacent to the target of your Strike, as [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), and then catch the dagger in your hand.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Gloaming Shard
